trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_SEQ_00<tab>Sphene would take you back to the outskirts.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the people of the outskirts.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_03<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_04<tab>Survey the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Erenville again.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Erenville again.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Erenville in the Earthen Sky hideout.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>Zoraal Ja, you bastard...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_SPHENE_000_010<tab>Perhaps we should head back to the outskirts? I daresay your friends will also have returned by now.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_MAHUWSA_000_011<tab>My thanks again for dealing with the fiends. Come and visit us any time.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>...Do you hear that?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_SPHENE_000_020<tab>There is so much of Alexandria I would love to show you!
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_MAHUWSA_000_025<tab>Like everyone, I have the utmost admiration and respect for Queen Sphene. It's a little embarrassing to say such things to her in person, though...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>What's going on? How could Pepoane suddenly forget about Namikka?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_031<tab>It's as if he never knew her...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_032<tab>Could the same thing have happened to others as well, I wonder?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_033<tab>There's only one way to find out. Let's make inquiries about Namikka in the area. We can reconvene afterwards at the aetheryte.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_034<tab>This is very unsettling...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GRAHATIA_000_035<tab>As far as I could tell, Pepoane genuinely had no recollection of Namikka.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_036<tab>We'll see how it is with other people.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_037<tab>I've never seen nor heard of anything like this before.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTA04930_000_040<tab>An old woman named Namikka?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTA04930_000_041<tab>I'm afraid I don't know that person. I'm sorry I couldn't be of help.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTA04930_000_045<tab>I'm sorry. Perhaps someone else knows this Namikka.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTB04930_000_050<tab>What's that? Do I know a Namikka?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTB04930_000_051<tab>Never met anyone by that name, and I've worked at the outskirts for a good while now. If she'd spent time here, I would remember.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTB04930_000_055<tab>Like as not, this Namikka is up in the cloud...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTC04930_000_060<tab>Hmmm... I do recall caring for someone until recently. And you say that it was a woman named Namikka?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTC04930_000_061<tab>While I can't say for certain if it was her, I wouldn't worry. I'm sure she's just been taken up to the cloud.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_OUTSKIRTSRESIDENTC04930_000_065<tab>It's not common, but it does happen from time to time.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>So it was the same for everyone.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_071<tab>Not a single person remembers Namikka. It's as if the memory of her has been purged from their minds.

TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_072<tab>While such a thing might be done with magic, to alter the memories of so many at once would be a tremendous undertaking. We would have felt a surge of aether corresponding to the act, too, and I sensed none in that moment.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_073<tab>Neither did I. But I did notice something else─right before Pepoane seemingly forgot, a light in the device on his head began to blink.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GRAHATIA_000_074<tab>Could there be a connection? Someone also said something about “soul cells.”
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GRAHATIA_000_075<tab>But who might we ask about this? If we continued making such inquiries, I expect we would only cause confusion.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_076<tab>Indeed... If we can't readily solve the mystery about Namikka, perhaps we could search for Cahciua instead?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_077<tab>Sphene said to try the Thunderyards.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_078<tab>It should be in this direction.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_CAHCIUA_000_079<tab>(-Unidentified Floating Object-)<gasp> Impossible!
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_080<tab>Hm?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_081<tab>Another kind of mechanical soldier!? It looks dangerous! We'd better destroy it!
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_CAHCIUA_000_082<tab>(-Unidentified Floating Object-)Uwaaah!
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_083<tab>Should we give chase?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>I think it understood our words. It might be worth asking it some questions.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>...Erenville? Are you alright? You look like you've seen a ghost.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_086<tab>I-It's nothing. I'm fine.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_087<tab>Well, it went off in the direction we're headed anyway, so let's try to track it down.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>Nothing but birds over here.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_095<tab>It's faster than it looks.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_100<tab>No sign of it over here.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GRAHATIA_000_105<tab>I do not see it...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_108<tab>That voice... Could it be...?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_110<tab>You found it!?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_111<tab>To the northeast? Then it must be bound for the mines.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_112<tab>Come on, then!
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_113<tab>It could well be a trap, so let's not rush in too quickly.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>So it went in here?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>I think it's safe to assume it went into the mines.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_125<tab>An old coal mine? It appears to have long since been abandoned, like so many other places.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GRAHATIA_000_130<tab>The stones in those crates... Could it be turquoise?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_140<tab>I heard faint voices coming from inside.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_141<tab>So it's not alone. But we're still going in, of course?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_142<tab>This may be a trap. Be ready for a fight, everyone!
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_145<tab>This tunnel just keeps going...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_150<tab>I'm not worried. We've had to improvise countless times before, after all.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_155<tab>A device made with electrope. It seems to be the only one here.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GRAHATIA_000_160<tab>It would appear no one has worked these tunnels in quite some time...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_170<tab>I can hear them. Several people up ahead.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_171<tab>Hmm. I can't make out their conversation with the echoing.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_172<tab>Let's keep going. Stay on your guard.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WUKLAMAT_000_180<tab>I can't say I understand what's going on, but at least Cahciua is safe.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ALISAIE_000_185<tab>Erenville's mother is a floating machine. Right─that makes about as much sense as everything else thus far.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_KRILE_000_190<tab>At this point, I doubt anything could possibly surprise me.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GRAHATIA_000_195<tab>The Allagans had machines that could be controlled remotely. Is she using something similar to communicate with us?
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_GEODE_000_200<tab>Always too much excitement with her... Sorry for drawing our weapons on you.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_NOSTALGIA_000_205<tab>If it's any consolation, this is all rather confusing to us as well.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_WAYAKKWE_000_210<tab>Oh, uh...hello.
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_CAHCIUA_000_215<tab>Come, come, make yourselves comfortable!
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_220<tab>As far as I can tell, this is indeed my mother. I can think of few people in the world quite so spirited...
TEXT_KINGMD119_04930_ERENVILLE_000_221<tab>But as to what's happened, we'll need to ask her...
